mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HBT_CART (CART_CODE , MEM_CODE , ITEM_CODE , NUM_OF_PEOPLE , CART_TOTAL_PRICE ) VALUES ( (SELECT 'CART_'||LPAD(NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(CART_CODE, 6))), 0) + 1, 3, '0') FROM HBT_CART) , (SELECT MEM_CODE FROM HBT_MEM WHERE MEM_ID = #{memCode}) , #{itemCode} , ${numOfPeople} , ((SELECT ITEM_PRICE FROM HBT_ITEM WHERE ITEM_CODE = #{itemCode}) * ${numOfPeople}) )
mapper.select: SELECT BUY_CODE , MEM_CODE , BUY_STATUS_CODE , BUY_TOTAL_PRICE , TO_CHAR(BUY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BUY_DATE FROM HBT_BUY WHERE MEM_CODE = #{memCode} ORDER BY BUY_DATE DESC

SELECT BUY.BUY_CODE , MEM_CODE , BUY_STATUS_CODE , BUY_TOTAL_PRICE , TO_CHAR(BUY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BUY_DATE , BUY_D_CODE , BD.ITEM_CODE , BD.AREA_CODE , DEPART_DATE , ARRIVE_DATE , RESERVED_PEOPLE_NUM , BUY_D_PRICE , ITEM_TITLE , ITEM_INTRO , TRAVER_PERIOD , ITEM_IMG_CODE , ITEM_IMG_ATTACHED_NAME , IS_MAIN FROM HBT_BUY BUY, HBT_BUY_DETAIL BD, HBT_ITEM_IMG IMG, HBT_ITEM ITEM WHERE BUY.BUY_CODE = BD.BUY_CODE AND BD.ITEM_CODE = IMG.ITEM_CODE AND BD.AREA_CODE = ITEM.AREA_CODE AND BUY.BUY_CODE = #{buyCode} ORDER BY BUY_DATE DESC

SELECT CART_CODE , MEM_CODE , TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') REG_DATE , CART.ITEM_CODE , NUM_OF_PEOPLE , CART_TOTAL_PRICE , ITEM_TITLE , ITEM_INTRO , ITEM_PRICE , ITEM.AREA_CODE , TRAVER_PERIOD , STATUS_CODE , ITEM_IMG_CODE , ITEM_IMG_ATTACHED_NAME , IS_MAIN , AREA_KOR_NAME FROM HBT_CART CART, HBT_ITEM ITEM, HBT_ITEM_IMG IMG, HBT_TOUR_AREA TOUR WHERE MEM_CODE = #{memCode} AND CART.ITEM_CODE = ITEM.ITEM_CODE AND ITEM.ITEM_CODE = IMG.ITEM_CODE AND ITEM.AREA_CODE = TOUR.AREA_CODE
